TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Howak, title = Howak, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howak} }

S.FORM: alang Howak ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Hikasiki go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 342 buwan, 471 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 23% kyan ku 106 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 77% kyan ku 365 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 22%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Howak hya' ga Cilafinan. tay mkyahu' na Howak hya' ga Asiroay . rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Howak ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Howak ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Howak ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Hikasiki go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 342 bowan, 471 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 23% kyan ko 106 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 77% kyan ko 365 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 22%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Howak hya' ga Cilafinan. tay mkyaho' na Howak hya' ga Asiroay . rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Howak ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Howak ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
